infos.value: That was it, right there. There is no mistaking it.
...Yes. That esper came out of nowhere and obliterated the first battalion.
No one in Leonis should be in possession of a relic that summons forth an esper.
Meaning that Machérie is somewhere on this battlefield.
I shall locate her immediately.
Stand down. I'll take care o' this myself.
But King Muraga...!?
War is for fighting. There's no place for gawkers.
Th' true pleasure o' battle lies in death throes an' bloodbaths.
Leonis has my pity, Your Fierceness.
They'll not need it for long.
Sir!
Y-you're... King Muraga of Fennes!
Now's our chance! Bite off the head of Muraga!
Even a demon could not stand a chance against our numbers!
Ready yourselves!
Silence you slugs. I want to hear naught...but the wrenching of screams.
Hear me, Oelde!
I'll take my pound o' flesh for your crime o' taking Machérie!
Hold on, my sweet Machérie!
